L_CSG_RESUME_1: For whom are we creating value?
L_CSG_RESUME_2: Who are our most important customers?
L_VP_RESUME_1: What value do we deliver to the customer?
L_VP_RESUME_2: Which one of our customer’s problems are we helping to solve?
L_VP_RESUME_3: What bundles of products and services are we offering to each Customer Segment?
L_VP_RESUME_4: Which customer needs are we satisfying?
L_CH_RESUME_1: Through which Channels do our Customer Segments want to be reached?
L_CH_RESUME_2: How are we reaching them now?
L_CH_RESUME_6: How are we integrating them with customer routines?
L_CR_RESUME_1: What type of relationship does each of our Customer Segments expect us to establish and maintain with them?
L_CR_RESUME_3: How are they integrated with the rest of our business model?
L_RS_RESUME_1: For what value are our customers really willing to pay?
L_RS_RESUME_2: For what do they currently pay?
L_RS_RESUME_4: How would they prefer to pay?
L_RS_RESUME_5: How much does each Revenue Stream contribute to overall revenues?
L_KS_RESUME_1: What Key Resources do our Value Propositions require?
L_KA_RESUME_1: What Key Activities do our Value Propositions require?
L_KP_RESUME_3: Which Key Resources are we acquiring from partners?
L_KP_RESUME_4: Which Key Activities do partners perform?
L_CS_RESUME_1: What are the most important costs inherent in our business model?
L_CS_RESUME_2: Which Key Resources are most expensive?
L_CS_RESUME_3: Which Key Activities are most expensive?
